.email to professor
.formal tone
.request to grant sick leave

Please create a well-structured, formal email with appropriate greeting, body, and closing.

Subject: Request for Sick Leave

Dear Professor [Last Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to inform you that due to unforeseen health issues, I find myself unable to attend class for the next few days. Consequently, I kindly request a leave of absence from [specific date] to [specific date].

During this period, I will ensure to stay updated with the class assignments and lectures. I would appreciate any additional resources or recordings of the classes I will miss to aid in my studies.

Thank you for your understanding and support during this time. Please let me know if there are any forms or procedures I should complete on my end.

Looking forward to your kind consideration.

Warm regards,

[Your Full Name]
[Your University ID, if applicable]
[Your Contact Information]
